section.title: What is it
section.p: MeTTTa demonstrates a number of features using a simple game of Tic Tac Toe.

section.title: How to use it
section.p: Download and install OpenEJB (openejb-3.0), from http://openejb.apache.org .
Create an environment variable called OPENEJB_HOME, and add OPENEJB_HOME/bin to the path.
Look at the simple HelloWorld example at http://openejb.apache.org/hello-world.html .
Create the remote interface, the bean class, and other Java classes:
Package the EJB: jar cvf mettta.jar org
Note: The server-side Java classes are:

ul.li: MeTTTaPojo.java (the business logic in a POJO)
